text: @DonaldJTrumpJr BREAKING NEWS: A WH whistleblower has revealed the reason for the lack of Coronavirus testing kits in the US: the Trump family is seeking to own the patent and branding rights. Lawyers are working overtime to ensure the beautiful TRUMP TESTING KIT is soon on the market.
